title: Agent Group Schema
description: Agent Group json-specification : A full description of fields of an agent group definition yaml file.

ArrayOfStrings.description: An array of strings custom type.

name.description: Name of the agent group argument.

type.description: Name of the agent group argument.

description.description: [Optional] - Description of the agent group argument.

value.description: [Optional] - Value of the agent group argument.

agentPortMapping.description: [Optional] - Array of dictionary-like objects, defining the port mapping.

kind.description: [Required] - Full name of the agent group.

description.description: [Required] - Text fully describing the agent group.

image.description: [Optional] - Path to the agent group image.

restart_policy.description: [Optional] - Restart policy of the agent group, e.g., none, any, on-failure.

restrictions.description: [Optional] - Array of strings explaining the restrictions of the agent group.

constraints.description: [Optional] - Array of strings explaning the constraints of the agent group.

agents.description: [Required] - List of dictionary-like objects explaining the agents belonging to the current agent group.

key.description: [Optional] - Key of the agent of the form agent/<organisation prefix>/<agent name>.

port_mapping.description: [Optional] - List of the agent port maping.
